statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT feedback_text, date_submitted FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating = 5
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE date_submitted BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE date_submitted >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating < 2 AND date_submitted BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-07-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 3.5;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3.0;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, AVG(effectiveness_rating) AS avg_rating FROM marketing_strategies GROUP BY strategy_name, target_audience;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM marketing_content;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT content_text, publish_date FROM marketing_content WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' AND content_type = 'Article';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, implementation_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE target_audience IN ('Male', 'Female') ORDER BY implementation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating, review_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%' ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM marketing_content WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, review_date FROM feedback ORDER BY review_date;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, review_date FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customers.customer_name, feedback.feedback_text FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT content_title, created_date FROM marketing_content WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE positive_reviews > 50;
SELECT content_text, feedback_score FROM MarketingContent WHERE target_audience = 'Senior Citizens';
SELECT feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM MobileMarketing WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM CampaignPerformance;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND feedback_id = 1001;
SELECT content_text, feedback_score FROM MarketingContent JOIN MobileMarketing ON MarketingContent.content_id = MobileMarketing.content_id WHERE total_clicks > 100 ORDER BY publish_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM MobileMarketing JOIN CampaignPerformance ON MobileMarketing.campaign_id = CampaignPerformance.campaign_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, positive_reviews, negative_reviews FROM ReviewAnalysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-12-31';
